程序包 com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.signup.signupFlows

类 SignupFlowController2

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.BaseController
com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.signup.signupFlows.SignupFlowController2
public class SignupFlowController2 extends BaseController
Controller for the second step of the signup flow. Handles user input for personal information, validation, and navigation between steps.
